Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.media.collections

Class CollectionController

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.media.collections.CollectionController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/rest/collections")
public class CollectionController
extends java.lang.Object
CollectionController

This Controller provides basic REST Interfaces to interact with Collection entities from the database

Author:
Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

  • Method Details

    • add

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @PostMapping(path="/add", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReducedCollectionDto> add​(@RequestBody Collection collection) throws UserNotFoundException
      This method adds a new collection to the database
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection that should be added
      Returns:
      the new collection entity that has been added
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user that should be creator of the collection does not exist

    • getAllByUser

      @GetMapping(path="/user/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CollectionDto>> getAllByUser​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="asc") java.lang.String order)
      This Method returns all collections of a given user
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the user
      page - the current page
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attribute that should be ordered by
      order - the order criteria (asc, desc)
      Returns:
      a list of found CollectionDTOs

    • getAllByMedium

      @GetMapping(path="/medium/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CollectionDto>> getAllByMedium​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="asc") java.lang.String order)
      This method is used to return all collections in which a certain medium is included
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the medium
      page - the current page
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attribute that should be ordered by
      order - the order criteria (asc, desc)
      Returns:
      a list of all collections of the medium

    • getCollectionsByUserWithUnusedMedia

      @GetMapping(path="/user/{userId}/medium/{mediumId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<ReducedCollectionDto>> getCollectionsByUserWithUnusedMedia​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long userId, @PathVariable java.lang.Long mediumId) throws java.lang.Exception
      This method is used to get all collections of a user that do not contain a certain medium
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which all collections should be searched
      mediumId - the id of the medium that should not be included
      Returns:
      the list of found collections
      Throws:
      MediumNotFoundException - if there is no medium with the given id
      java.lang.Exception

    • getOne

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CollectionDto> getOne​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws CollectionNotFoundException
      This method returns the collection that belongs to the given id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the collection that should be searched
      Returns:
      the found collection
      Throws:
      CollectionNotFoundException - if there is no collection with the given id

    • update

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @PutMapping(consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReducedCollectionDto> update​(@RequestBody Collection collection) throws CollectionNotFoundException
      This method is used to update a given collection
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection that should be updated
      Returns:
      the updated collection
      Throws:
      CollectionNotFoundException - if there is no collection that matches the given id

    • deleteMediumFromCollection

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @DeleteMapping(path="/{collectionId}/medium/{mediumId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CollectionDto> deleteMediumFromCollection​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long collectionId, @PathVariable java.lang.Long mediumId) throws CollectionNotFoundException
      This method is used to remove a medium from a collection
      Parameters:
      collectionId - the id of the collection that should be updated
      mediumId - the id of the medium that should be removed from the collection
      Returns:
      the updated
      Throws:
      CollectionNotFoundException - if there is no collection with the given id

    • addMediumToCollection

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @PutMapping(path="/{collectionId}/medium/{mediumId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CollectionDto> addMediumToCollection​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long collectionId, @PathVariable java.lang.Long mediumId) throws CollectionNotFoundException
      This method is used to add a medium to a collection
      Parameters:
      collectionId - the id of the collection that should be updated
      mediumId - the id of the medium that should be added
      Returns:
      the updated collection
      Throws:
      CollectionNotFoundException - if there is no collection with the given id

    • delete

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @DeleteMapping(path="/{collectionId}") org.springframework.http.HttpStatus delete​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long collectionId) throws CollectionNotFoundException
      This method is used to delete an existing collection from the database
      Parameters:
      collectionId - the id of the collection that should be deleted
      Returns:
      http status 200 after deleting
      Throws:
      CollectionNotFoundException
